scripts.build-win: if not exist dist mkdir dist && node -c index.js && copy index.js dist\ && copy package*.json dist\ && echo Build completed - Built files in dist/
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && node -c index.js && cp index.js package*.json dist/ && echo 'Build completed - Built files in dist/'
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && echo 'Ready for deployment from dist/'
